DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the relative bioequivalence of Bupropion HCI 150 mg SR Tablets under fasting conditions.
DOC.brief_title: A Relative Bioavailability Study of Bupropion HCI 150 mg Sustained-Release Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal finding on physical exam, medical history, or clinical laboratory results on screening. Positive test results for HIV or hepatitis B or C. Treatment for drug or alcohol dependence.
